dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-jedi
dependencies.description: An autocompletion tool for Python that can be used for text editors.

dependencies.name: py-pyflakes
dependencies.description: A simple program which checks Python source files for errors.

dependencies.name: py-pygments
dependencies.description: Pygments is a syntax highlighting package written in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pycodestyle
dependencies.description:
pycodestyle is a tool to check your Python code against some of the
style conventions in PEP 8. Note: formerly called pep8.

dependencies.name: py-psutil
dependencies.description:
psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running
processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network) in
Python.

dependencies.name: py-qtawesome
dependencies.description: FontAwesome icons in PyQt and PySide applications

dependencies.name: qt
dependencies.description: Qt is a comprehensive cross-platform C++ application framework.

dependencies.name: py-chardet
dependencies.description: Universal encoding detector for Python 2 and 3

dependent_to.name: py-guidata
dependent_to.description:
Automatic graphical user interfaces generation for easy dataset editing
and display
